name: miaow
content:

(of a cat) to make a high, crying sound: A cat was miaowing pitifully outside the door. A cat miaowed from somewhere in the house. Compare
mew verb
purr verb
More examplesFewer examplesOne of my cats just miaowed in the background.Steve was opening a tin of food for the cat, who was miaowing silently.She would purr, but not miaow.
